unit.utterance_translation: (A long time) ago,

they singed (it)

the following morning,

unit.utterance: Basta nalu:tudi attanan ni yakkandi aydi mabaw

some of my grandparents

in Aglipay.

because they were shooting (at?) the forest.

there in Aglipay in those days.

because they were cruel.
